title: 142 - The Bobcat Ate My Baby
description: Today Pod has the pleasure of being hosted by the one and only Mike Mansury. As some of the boys have taken the trip down to Tampa Florida we have Jay joining the boys again as well. The boys jump right into catching up on their lives as they discuss Billy Tubes dealing with car insurance troubles. Then jumping right into the movie discussions with Mortal Combat's new movie has released its first seven minutes, and then the boys jump right into the Fod. Today's Fod includes billboards asking to bring back tony stark, the anniversary of shrek, size of a gorillas hand, how much poop gets sprayed while flushing, and much much more from the wild internet. Make sure to got and subscribe to YouTube.com/thepodpmi and watch along with us every Wednesday and Friday.
